Node.definition: = action by which humans or divine beings express their appreciation, admiration, respect, and/or gratitude to (other) humans or deities about who they are and what they do
= short form of יהוה (יהוה) only found in poetic texts
= state of being considered fortunate and blessed by God; ≈ accompanied by an attitude of admiration

Node.gloss: to be afraid|to fear|to be in awe of|to revere
Node.definition: = state in which humans experience fear

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= state in which humans feel emotionally attached to a particular event
= a human being, animal, or supernatural being who is renowned for his characteristics, such as physical strength, power, bravery, skill, wealth, good character, or a combination thereof

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= a person’s child or children, or the young of an animal
= all of the people born and living at about the same time
= person whose behavior is morally and ethically right

Node.gloss: to bless|to praise|to greet|to congratulate|to commend
Node.definition: = causative action by which deities grant a special favor to humans, objects, or events, or by which humans invoke a deity to do the same
= a large quantity of valuable resources, ownership of which affects the way people think and live
= state in which humans possess an abundance of valuable goods, ≈ which is usually associated with a high status and considered a blessing from God

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction

= pattern of behavior of humans or deities that is in accordance to the requirements of the divine law and generally aimed at establishing or restoring this pattern as a standard, which in certain cases requires a victory over evil and results in prosperity and happiness
= an adverb that specifies unending time
= process by which the sun appears in the morning to provide light and warmth to the world; ≈ associated with a new period of well being

= state in which there is no light, ◄ caused by the fact that the light of sun, moon, and stars cannot reach the location that is in focus, ► resulting in a state in which no one can readily see, and colors and shapes can no longer be distinguished; loved by the wicked only; ≈ associated with hardship, ignorance, death, and oblivion

= light as a physical phenomenon, mainly observed during daytime, and the opposite of darkness; ◄ one of God's most important attributes; first created by God and since produced by sun, moon, and stars, but also by fire; ► enables people and animals to see; ≈ associated with life, goodness, happiness, prosperity, security, favor, and wisdom, loved by the righteous, and hated by the wicked
= person whose behavior is morally and ethically right
= state in which deities are favorably disposed to someone, or of experiencing an emotion of compassion towards other people, and acting accordingly
= state in which deities feel compassion for humans, ► which is usually translated into action
= state in which a person's or deity's behavior is fully consistent with the requirements of the law, either in a specific matter that is under dispute or as one's general mode of behavior
= state in which humans and deities have character, integrity, and good fortune

Node.gloss: to be kindly disposed|to be generous|to be merciful|to be gracious|to pity
Node.definition: = state in which humans or deities are favorably disposed to (other) humans, and act accordingly
= to give money or other valuables to someone else, which can be used for some time but is to be returned later, whether with interest or not; ≈ often associated with wealth and acts of charity
= process by which humans or objects attain a certain goal
= practices that conform to the laws of God
= a long duration of time that is or may seem unending, whether in the past or in the future
literally: to be shaken; hence: = state in which humans are affected by difficult circumstances and feel worried and concerned
= process in which information that is stored in one's mind regarding someone or something is being reprocessed continually and/or repeatedly
= a long duration of time that is or may seem unending, whether in the past or in the future
= state in which a person's or deity's behavior is fully consistent with the requirements of the law, either in a specific matter that is under dispute or as one's general mode of behavior
= state of an event or an object that is very difficult or painful or harmful; also used to describe the attitude or emotion in reaction to such an event

Node.gloss: to be afraid|to fear|to be in awe of|to revere
Node.definition: = state in which humans experience fear
literally: (one's) heart is established
literally: heart; hence: = the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief
= state in which humans have confidence in God; ≈ regarded as positive
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

Node.gloss: to be confident|to be encouraged|to rely on|to depend on
Node.definition: = process by which humans receive mental strength as a result of the help provided by others
literally: heart; hence: = the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief

Node.gloss: to be afraid|to fear|to be in awe of|to revere
Node.definition: = state in which humans experience fear
particle linking two events; = relation indicating that event X ends at the time of occurrence or completion of event Y
= a linker introducing a propostion that contains the content of what precedes

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something
primarily used in poetry: = person that opposes other people and so is a cause of distress to others
= person who does not have the means to provide for himself/herself, economically or otherwise, and therefore depends on help from other people and God

= pattern of behavior of humans or deities that is in accordance to the requirements of the divine law and generally aimed at establishing or restoring this pattern as a standard, which in certain cases requires a victory over evil and results in prosperity and happiness
= an adverb that specifies unending time

= outgrowth of bone encased in hardened skin, often curved and pointed, found in pairs on the heads of cattle, sheep, goats, and other animals; ≈ associated with strength and honor; a raised horn symbolizes confidence and/or pride
literally: (one's) horn is lifted up; hence: = process by which humans find new confidence
= position of honor; ◄ often as a result of wealth and/or authority

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something

Node.gloss: to be, become vexed|to be, become angry
Node.definition: = state/process by which humans or deities experience displeasure; ◄ caused by someone else's condition or behavior

Node.gloss: to grind one's teeth|to gnash one's teeth
Node.definition: = to gnash or grind one's teeth עַל with regard to someone else ► in order to express one's hostility
literally: to melt; hence: = process by which people or objects to vanish from existence
= state in which humans experience a desire to see something happen or do something oneself; ◄ this desire is associated with one's heart (לֵב) or throat (נֶפֶשׁ) ≈ and can be both good and evil

Node.gloss: to perish|to come to an end
Node.definition: = process by which an event comes to an end, usually under unfavorable circumstances
